description.value:
A civilian relief item in the form of rolled up parchments containing inspirational messages to maintain spiritual wellbeing, conveniently written on edible paper filled with nutrients for physical wellbeing.

Requirements

One day's worth of food for one person

Effect: Average

Notes: 1 T
